name: VladStudio Style - cute, soft brush, watercolor style of wallpapers
description:
What is this?

This is a textual inversion trained on selected wallpapers of legendary artists VladStudio. The style will produce soft gradient colors, black outlines around the character, and a soft brush effect of watercolor painting.

What can I create with this?

Random cute wallpapers or images for puzzle games or just add it as a style to landscapes or scenes. It doesn't work well on characters as it will try to doodle them into the style.

Honestly, the style is unpredictable but you will be able to pick 20-30% of images and some will be very interesting.

How to work with VladStudio style?

To use the style on the landscape, follow the workflow explained here.

Wallpaper creation workflow

Settings

Recommended style strength 0.5-0.8 for creative results, 1.0 for full Vlad Studio characters. Example: (vladstudio:0.8).

CFG 7-9, depending on the model. Steps 30-50 (simple graphics, so enough). Canvas size 640x360 with high-res fix of x1.8 or 2 times, your fav upscaler, and denoising strength of 0.2-0.4. When happy, upscale more for your desired HD resolution.

Positive prompt formula

8k Unity Wallpaper, (vladstudio:0.8), [X]

[X] holds the values from the X field in the StylePile extension. Feel free to add your additional style descriptor at the end ([X], volumetric light, surreal etc) if you wish, but may affect the style.

[X] Values (subject only, no descriptors):

cute wallpaper

1boy and 1girl

lonely tree, centered

multiple hearts, love, musical notes, red theme

starry night, dark blue theme

Negative prompt

use a couple of negative embeddings and negative tags from example images of your model.

For deliberate, I used:

ng_deepnegative_v1_75t, ((((ugly)))), (((duplicate))), ((morbid)), ((mutilated)),(((cross eyed))), [out of frame], extra fingers, mutated hands, extra ears, ((poorly drawn hands)), ((poorly drawn face)), (((mutation))), (((deformed))), blurry, ((bad anatomy)), (((bad proportions))), ((extra limbs)), cloned face, (((disfigured))). out of frame, ugly, extra limbs, (bad anatomy), gross proportions, (malformed limbs), ((missing arms)), ((missing legs)), (((extra arms))), (((extra legs))), mutated hands, (fused fingers), (too many fingers), (((long neck))), (((text))),(((signatures))), face cut, head cut, cropped head, jpeg artifacts, low quality, lowres, text, watermark, logo, text, letters, signature, username, words, blurry, cropped, cartoon, worst quality, split images, out of frame, duplicate, watermark, signature, frame, text

Thanks for using

Please check the review examples below, some amazing results.

This style delivers totally unpredictable and non-repeatable results, so please share your creations with us!
